blogPost.title: How can we make college more affordable for Americans? Answer by @MaryDalyEcon, President & CEO @sffed. https://t.co/TWieQetsBK https://t.co/RJUnLxQW2L
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: どうすればアメリカ人が大学に通えるようになるのでしょうか？Answer by @MaryDalyEcon, President & CEO @sffed. https://t.co/TWieQetsBK https://t.co/RJUnLxQW2L
我们如何才能使美国人更能负担得起大学？回答者：@MaryDalyEcon, President & CEO @sffed. https://t.co/TWieQetsBK https://t.co/RJUnLxQW2L
我們如何才能使美國人更能負擔得起大學？回答者：@MaryDalyEcon, President & CEO @sffed. https://t.co/TWieQetsBK https://t.co/RJUnLxQW2L

previous.title: Why is diversity important in data science? Answer by Ashok Srivastava, Chief Data Officer @Intuit. https://t.co/gByUpyN258 https://t.co/38LDi6mjdY

localize.full_text: データサイエンスではなぜ多様性が重要なのでしょうか？Answer by Ashok Srivastava, Chief Data Officer @Intuit. https://t.co/gByUpyN258 https://t.co/38LDi6mjdY
为什么多样性在数据科学中很重要？回答者：Ashok Srivastava，首席数据官@Intuit。https://t.co/gByUpyN258 https://t.co/38LDi6mjdY
爲什麼多樣性在數據科學中很重要？回答者：Ashok Srivastava，首席數據官@Intuit。https://t.co/gByUpyN258 https://t.co/38LDi6mjdY

next.title: Are people born entrepreneurs or can they learn to develop entrepreneurial traits? Answer by @CWaltersPhD, Business & Branding Mentor, Corporate Training. https://t.co/QL3H77VUZO https://t.co/XYHkZQYd7o

localize.full_text: 人は生まれながらにして起業家なのか、それとも起業家としての特性を身につけるために学ぶことができるのか？Answer by @CWaltersPhD, Business & Branding Mentor, Corporate Training. https://t.co/QL3H77VUZO https://t.co/XYHkZQYd7o
人们是天生的企业家还是可以通过学习来培养企业家的特质？回答者：@CWaltersPhD，商业& 品牌导师，企业培训。https://t.co/QL3H77VUZO https://t.co/XYHkZQYd7o
人們是天生的企業家還是可以通過學習來培養企業家的特質？回答者：@CWaltersPhD，商業& 品牌導師，企業培訓。https://t.co/QL3H77VUZO https://t.co/XYHkZQYd7o
